summary: Update the default schedule catchup window value from 30 days to 1 year in the TypeScript SDK documentation and type definitions, aligning with changes made in the Temporal API.
userImpact: Users reference incorrect default catchup window value when configuring schedules, potentially leading to unexpected behavior.
proposedFix: Update the default catchup window value in schedule-types.ts line 44 from 30 days to 1 year to match API changes.
resolutionDetails: Documentation and type definitions updated to reflect the 1 year default catchup window per API PR #308.
